full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement: Automated Test Dishwashing Machine

### Title and Reference Information
Built by | Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), though the end user is | Department of Health (HC).

### Summary and Background
The Department of Health (HC) requires an Automated Test Dishwashing Machine to facilitate method development and testing for single-use plastics under the Single-Use Plastics Prohibition Regulations (SOR/2022-138).  The the product safety laboratory is located in Ottawa, ON, and delivery is required by March 31, 2023.

### Tender Details
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3749455149
*   **Publication Date:** 2022-11-22
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-08 14:00:00 EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2022-12-12
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-12-23

### Important Notes

*   Please disregard the original closing time posted on Ariba Discovery.
*   Supporting documentation and Statements of Capabilities must be submitted by 2022-12-08 14:00:00 EST.
*   Only one supplier will be invited to submit a tender for this opportunity.

### Requirements

*   Suppliers must meet the mandatory requirements outlined in the Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN).

### Contact Information

*   Contracting Officer: Wijaya Putri, Yessica Karnali (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Contact Email: [yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Contact URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14703290?extsite=MTQ3MDMyOTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14703290?extsite=MTQ3MDMyOTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
